bibl.title: Oxyrhynchus Papyrus 2069 and the Compositional History of Enoch.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XVII, 2069 (= van Haelst 576-577; LDAB 1087; 3178). - 1. Fragments 1R-2R = 1 Enoch 85:10-86:2; Fragments 1V-2V = 1 Enoch 87:1-3. - 2. Fragment 3V = 1 Enoch 77:7-78:1; Fragment 3R = 1 Enoch 78:8. - 3. Two codices? [The fragments should be considered parts of the same codex.] - 4. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Chesnutt Randall D., Oxyrhynchus Papyrus 2069 and the Compositional History of Enoch.

P. Oxy. XVII, 2069 (= van Haelst 576-577; LDAB 1087; 3178). - 1. Fragments 1R-2R = 1 Enoch 85:10-86:2; Fragments 1V-2V = 1 Enoch 87:1-3. - 2. Fragment 3V = 1 Enoch 77:7-78:1; Fragment 3R = 1 Enoch 78:8. - 3. Two codices? [The fragments should be considered parts of the same codex.] - 4. Conclusion.
